body: Using packages being built with our own depends system is irrelevant to using packages being managed by user's OS, no?

Are there any bug fixes / anything else interesting for us about this update other than removing a single patch from depends? I can't seem to find an actual changelog, other than https://code.qt.io/cgit/qt/qtbase.git/log/?h=v5.15.5-lts-lgpl.

> Are there any bug fixes / anything else interesting for us about this update other than removing a single patch from depends?

No, there are not.

### Conflicts
Reviewers, this pull request conflicts with the following ones:

* [#21778](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/21778) (build: LLVM 14 & LLD based macOS toolchain by fanquake)

If you consider this pull request important, please also help to review the conflicting pull requests. Ideally, start with the one that should be merged first.
